title: Bug 155972NullPointerException in ConstructorSignature.getConstructor()
description: Bug 155972NullPointerException in ConstructorSignature.getConstructor() AspectJ version: 1.5.3.200608290814When advising a constructor, we can do the following to obtain the constructor as a java.lang.reflect.Member:Member cons = ((ConstructorSignature) thisJoinPointStaticPart.getSignature()).getConstructor();however that sometimes fails, and returns null.
